short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A COVID-19 tracker that shows the current confirmed COVID-19 cases in your area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thanks for checking out this extension app! 

Covid Tracker is designed for visualizing the COVID-19 confirmed cases based on your geolocation.
